pages.text: Farming in Beyond the Horizon has been revolutionized with advanced tools and methods. Hoes can harvest crops in larger areas, and right-clicking will replant the crops automatically, making farming more efficient than ever.

For larger scale farming, use the $(l:travel/astikor_carts)plow cart$() to till large areas of land quickly. This horse-drawn cart enhances your ability to prepare fields for planting, speeding up the setup of your fields.

To fully automate your farms, employ the $(l:mod_info/create)Create mod$()'s harvester contraptions or $(l:mod_info/immersive_engineering)Garden Cloches$() from Immersive Engineering. These setups allow for the automatic harvesting and optimal growth of crops, streamlining your food production.
Setting up a $(l:mod_info/minecolonies)Mine Colony$() will put the power of an entire colony behind your farming efforts, significantly boosting your agricultural productivity.
